meta.name: description
meta.content: The men and women of the Onslow County Sheriff's Office will strive, at all times, to provide for the peace and security of all residents and visitors to Onslow County.

li.p: Stay Up-To-Date With the Onslow County Sheriff's Office

div.class: inner col col24 first last idbdf7aaec-5a87-4121-b56a-8a5f44d578db

div.div:
Engage in breakout groups to discuss how the County should look 5 years from now.
September 3 - 6PM at Sneads Ferry Environmental Education Center September 4 - 11:30AM at Hammocks Beach State Park September 4 - 6PM at Onslow County Government Center Tell us your thoughts...

h4.a: Tell us what matters to you!

div.div: Take our short survey to provide your perspective on where you think Onslow County should prioritize resources and focus. The Strategic Plan will guide the County's operations over the next five years. Share Your Input...

h4.a: NC Sheriffs' Association Presents 2023 Defender of Public Safety Awards

div.div: Senator Lazzara and Representative Cleveland received the NC Sheriffs' Association's Defender of Public Safety Award. Read on...

h4.a: Onslow County Opioid Settlement Funds Meeting & Resource Fair

div.div: Onslow County will hold its second Opioid Settlement Funds Community Meeting on Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 4PM at Jacksonville Station located at 1300 N. Marine Blvd, Jacksonville with a Community Resource Fair to Follow. Find Out More on Meeting & Fair...

h4.a: Drug Enforcement Unit Executes Joint Investigation

div.div: The Sheriff's Office, NCIS, Jacksonville and Holly Ridge Police Departments, and Pender County Sheriff's Office executed two search warrants that resulted in multiple arrests, drugs and guns. Read on...

h4.a: Mission Statement of the Onslow County Sheriff's Office

div.div: The Onslow County Sheriffâ€™s Office will protect the constitutional rights of citizens to be secure in their possessions, be free from crime, and live in peace. Additional Info...
Cash rewards up to $5,000 for anonymous tips that are helpful to law enforcement. 910-938-3273. Additional Info...
